structure.unit: ARTICLE CLII. PALMERA AT CORAL WAY STREET LIGHTING SPECIAL TAXING DISTRICT

text.section: The area or boundaries of this proposed special taxing district are as follows:

A portion of Section 10, Township 54 South, Range 39 East, of Miami-Dade County, Florida; being more particularly described as follows:
The W ½ of Tract 31 of Section 10, Township 54 South, Range 39 East, less the south 15.00 feet for road right-of-way, "J.G. Head's Farms Subdivision", according to the Plat thereof, as recorded in Plat Book 46, Page 44 of the Public Records of Miami-Dade County, Florida (a.k.a. Palmera at Coral Way, Tentative Plat # T-23404).
The area and geographical location of this proposed special taxing district are shown on the Exhibit A map or sketch, and made a part herein by reference.
